review:
I sincerely thank Dr. Srinath sir for treating my mother. she was suffering from L3, L4, L5 disc bulge from past 1year . Latest we got to know about Asha Hospital Dr. Srinath sir specialist in Orthopaedic Oncologist. Doctor explained each and everything about how my mother got & suffering from pain and how they going to cure it in positive way . Right now my mother got cured and fine from disc bulge. I thank Dr. G.V.Prakash sir Physiotherapist for taking care , had high
Patience and helps to restore movement & function and given lot positiveness. I Thank you and Hospital team for all the kind support and everything both as a doctor & politician really awarded to see you and your hospital service & surgical technique. Very Co-operative and friendly staff and understands patients problem very well. I highly recommend Asha Hospital. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

review: My 4 year old kid fractured her hand.. Took treatment from Dr srinath at excel hospital bsk... He was very sweet and kind, soft spoken, ****** ** **** **** ********* ** *** ** ****** ****** *** ** ** ***** ******* First time we took xray (310rs) and then Dr consulted (450rs) and decided to apply pop (2000rs.. This I felt was a little steep but was told by my other Dr pals that its pretty much in line with other small hospitals), second time we went after a week or so.. Took another xray (310rs), Dr consulted (free), third time we went after 15 days.. Dr removed the pop (450rs - he was sweet enough to take only his consultation charges and nothing extra)... Overall liked his diagnosis and his approach towards kids, a thorough professional... I would definitely recommend him and excel hospital both
Fixed appointment for 6 pm. Doctor didn‚Äôt turn up till 7 pm. Very unhappy and inconvenienced. Only later were we informed that an emergency turned up.

A very good Doctor. Have a lot of patience to listen to his patients. **** ************* ** ***** *** ********* **** ** *** ** **** ********* Do not recommend or believe in lot of medication. Always recommends for physical exercise.

Overall a very good Doctor and am very happy that i have consulted.
